summary.span: 使用 GetEditorStyle 提供的编辑器样式编辑指定的对象值。

span.span: Edits the specified object value using the editor style provided by GetEditorStyle.

summary.span: 提供服务提供程序以获取任何所需要的编辑服务。

span.span: A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
The new value of the object.

returns.span: 如果该对象的值尚未更改，则这应返回与传递给它的对象相同的对象。

span.span: If the value of the object hasn't changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
